configure {
    router "Base" {
        bgp {
            connect-retry 90
            group "external" {
                description "Transit Provider B"
                delete description "Transit Provider A"
            }
            neighbor "192.168.1.1" {
                description "PE to Transit-B"
                delete description "PE to Transit-A"
            }
            neighbor "192.168.2.1" {
                group "external"
                description "PE to Transit-B backup"
            }
            delete connect-retry 120
        }
        interface "to-core-2" {
            admin-state enable
            port 1/1/2
            ipv4 {
                primary {
                    address 10.0.0.5
                    prefix-length 30
                }
            }
        }
        ospf 0 {
            area 0.0.0.0 {
                interface "to-core-2" {
                    interface-type point-to-point
                }
                delete interface "to-core-1"
            }
        }
        delete interface "to-core-1"
    }
    service {
        vprn "customer-a" {
            interface "to-ce-1" {
                sap 1/1/3:100 {
                    ingress {
                        qos 20
                        delete qos 10
                    }
                    egress {
                        qos 20
                        delete qos 10
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
